name: Untitled Skiing Games
description:
How to play the game

Tap the screen once to jump.

Tap the screen twice in a row to double-jump

Maintain pressure for a few second to crouch.

If you touch anything on your way down, you die.

If you pass through the red hearth icon, you gain one life that allows you to collide once with an obstacle without dying.

Will you get further than your friends ? Will you far enough to unravel the secret ending ?

Enjoy the game and share your best scores.
